trans-unit.source: constant always predicts a constant value that is provided by the user.
trans-unit.target: constant 始终预测用户提供的常量值。

trans-unit.source: cov = components_.T * S**2 * components_ + sigma2 * eye(n_features) where S**2 contains the explained variances, and sigma2 contains the noise variances.
trans-unit.target: cov = components_.T * S**2 * components_ + sigma2 * eye(n_features) 其中，S ** 2包含解释的方差，而sigma2包含噪声方差。

trans-unit.source: covariance.EllipticEnvelope assumes the data is Gaussian and learns an ellipse. It thus degrades when the data is not unimodal. Notice however that this estimator is robust to outliers.
trans-unit.target: covariance.EllipticEnvelope 假定数据为高斯并学习一个椭圆。因此，当数据不是单峰时，它会降级。但是请注意，此估计量对异常值具有鲁棒性。

trans-unit.source: data - folder to put the datasets used during the tutorial
trans-unit.target: data -文件夹，把在本教程中使用的数据集

trans-unit.source: data: The feature matrix is a scipy CSR sparse matrix, with 804414 samples and 47236 features. Non-zero values contains cosine-normalized, log TF-IDF vectors. A nearly chronological split is proposed in [1]: The first 23149 samples are the training set. The last 781265 samples are the testing set. This follows the official LYRL2004 chronological split. The array has 0.16% of non zero values:
trans-unit.target: data ：特征矩阵是一个稀疏的CSR稀疏矩阵，具有804414个样本和47236个特征。非零值包含余弦标准化的对数TF-IDF向量。在[1]中提出了一个按时间顺序的划分：前23149个样本是训练集。最后的781265个样本是测试集。这是按照LYRL2004官方时间顺序进行的。数组具有0.16％的非零值：

trans-unit.source: ensemble.IsolationForest and neighbors.LocalOutlierFactor seem to perform reasonably well for multi-modal data sets. The advantage of neighbors.LocalOutlierFactor over the other estimators is shown for the third data set, where the two modes have different densities. This advantage is explained by the local aspect of LOF, meaning that it only compares the score of abnormality of one sample with the scores of its neighbors.
trans-unit.target: ensemble.IsolationForest 和 neighbors.LocalOutlierFactor 对于多模式数据集似乎表现良好。对于第三个数据集，显示了 neighbors.LocalOutlierFactor 相对于其他估计量的优势，其中两种模式的密度不同。LOF的本地方面解释了这一优势，这意味着它仅将一个样本的异常评分与其邻居的评分进行比较。

trans-unit.source: fit(X, y): Fit model to given training data and target values.
trans-unit.target: fit(X, y) ：使模型适合给定的训练数据和目标值。

trans-unit.source: int : the model fit is AgglomerativeClustering with n_clusters set to be equal to the int.
trans-unit.target: int ：模型拟合为 AgglomerativeClustering ,其中 n_clusters 设置为等于int。

trans-unit.source: joblib.dump and joblib.load functions also accept file-like object instead of filenames. More information on data persistence with Joblib is available here.
trans-unit.target: joblib.dump 和 joblib.load 函数还接受类似于文件的对象而不是文件名。有关Joblib数据持久性的更多信息，请参见此处。

trans-unit.source: leaf_size is not referenced for brute force queries.
mean always predicts the mean of the training targets.
trans-unit.target: mean 总是预测训练目标的平均值。

trans-unit.source: median always predicts the median of the training targets.
trans-unit.target: median 总是预测训练目标的中位数。

trans-unit.source: most_frequent always predicts the most frequent label in the training set.
trans-unit.target: most_frequent 总是预测训练集中的最频繁标签。

trans-unit.source: multiclass of integers is more specific but compatible with continuous.
trans-unit.target: multiclass 整数的多类更具体，但与 continuous 兼容。

trans-unit.source: multilabel-indicator is more specific but compatible with multiclass-multioutput.

n_iter_no_change is used to decide if early stopping will be used to terminate training when validation score is not improving. By default it is set to None to disable early stopping. If set to a number, it will set aside validation_fraction size of the training data as validation and terminate training when validation score is not improving in all of the previous n_iter_no_change numbers of iterations.
trans-unit.target: n_iter_no_change 用于确定在验证分数没有提高时是否将使用早期停止来终止训练。默认情况下，将其设置为“无”以禁用提前停止。如果设置为数字，它将保留训练数据的 validation_fraction 大小作为验证，并在以前的所有 n_iter_no_change 迭代次数中验证得分均未提高时终止训练。

trans-unit.source: n_jobs=-1 means that the computation will be dispatched on all the CPUs of the computer.
trans-unit.target: n_jobs=-1 表示将在计算机的所有CPU上调度计算。

trans-unit.source: preprocessor: a callable that takes an entire document as input (as a single string), and returns a possibly transformed version of the document, still as an entire string. This can be used to remove HTML tags, lowercase the entire document, etc.
trans-unit.target: preprocessor ：一个可调用的方法，将整个文档作为输入（作为单个字符串），并返回文档的可能转换后的版本，仍作为整个字符串。这可用于删除HTML标记，将整个文档小写等。

trans-unit.source: prior always predicts the class that maximizes the class prior (like most_frequent) and predict_proba returns the class prior.
trans-unit.target: prior 总是预测之前最大化类（如类 most_frequent ）和 predict_proba 返回类之前。

trans-unit.source: quantile always predicts a user provided quantile of the training targets.
trans-unit.target: quantile 总是预测用户提供的训练目标分位数。

trans-unit.source: return_train_score is set to True by default. It adds train score keys for all the scorers. If train scores are not needed, this should be set to False explicitly.
trans-unit.target: return_train_score 默认情况下，return_train_score设置为 True 。它为所有得分手添加了火车得分键。如果不需要火车分数，则应将其明确设置为 False 。

trans-unit.source: scikit-learn comes with a few standard datasets, for instance the iris and digits datasets for classification and the boston house prices dataset for regression.
trans-unit.target: scikit-learn 带有一些标准数据集，例如用于分类的虹膜和数字数据集和用于回归的波士顿房价数据集。

trans-unit.source: scikit-learn provides two label propagation models: LabelPropagation and LabelSpreading. Both work by constructing a similarity graph over all items in the input dataset.
trans-unit.target: scikit-learn 提供了两个标签传播模型： LabelPropagation 和 LabelSpreading 。两者都通过在输入数据集中的所有项目上构建相似度图来工作。

trans-unit.source: scikit-learn provides two loaders that will automatically download, cache, parse the metadata files, decode the jpeg and convert the interesting slices into memmapped numpy arrays. This dataset size is more than 200 MB. The first load typically takes more than a couple of minutes to fully decode the relevant part of the JPEG files into numpy arrays. If the dataset has been loaded once, the following times the loading times less than 200ms by using a memmapped version memoized on the disk in the ~/scikit_learn_data/lfw_home/ folder using joblib.
trans-unit.target: scikit-learn 提供了两个加载器，它们将自动下载，缓存，解析元数据文件，解码jpeg并将有趣的切片转换为memmapped numpy数组。该数据集的大小大于200 MB。首次加载通常需要花费几分钟以上的时间才能将JPEG文件的相关部分完全解码为numpy数组。如果数据集已经过一次，下面的时间少了加载时间超过200ms使用memoized在磁盘上的memmapped版本加载 ~/scikit_learn_data/lfw_home/ 文件夹使用 joblib 。

trans-unit.source: scipy.sparse matrices are data structures that do exactly this, and scikit-learn has built-in support for these structures.
trans-unit.target: scipy.sparse 矩阵是可精确执行此操作的数据结构，而 scikit-learn 内置了对这些结构的支持。

trans-unit.source: score(X, y): Returns the mean accuracy on the given test data, which is used for the stop criterion defined by stop_score. Additionally, the score is used to decide which of two equally large consensus sets is chosen as the better one.
trans-unit.target: score(X, y) ：返回给定测试数据的平均准确度，该平均准确度用于 stop_score 定义的停止标准。另外，该分数用于确定选择两个相等的大共识集中的哪个作为更好的集合。

trans-unit.source: sklearn.mixture is a package which enables one to learn Gaussian Mixture Models (diagonal, spherical, tied and full covariance matrices supported), sample them, and estimate them from data. Facilities to help determine the appropriate number of components are also provided.
trans-unit.target: sklearn.mixture 是一个程序包，使人们可以学习高斯混合模型（对角，球面，束缚和完全协方差矩阵受支持），对其进行采样并从数据中进行估计。还提供了帮助确定适当数量的组件的工具。

trans-unit.source: stratified generates random predictions by respecting the training set class distribution.
trans-unit.target: stratified 通过尊重训练集类别分布，分层生成随机预测。

trans-unit.source: target: The target values are stored in a scipy CSR sparse matrix, with 804414 samples and 103 categories. Each sample has a value of 1 in its categories, and 0 in others. The array has 3.15% of non zero values:
trans-unit.target: target ：目标值存储在一个稀疏的CSR稀疏矩阵中，具有804414个样本和103个类别。每个样本在其类别中的值为1，在其他类别中的值为0。数组具有3.15％的非零值：

trans-unit.source: target_names: The target values are the topics of each sample. Each sample belongs to at least one topic, and to up to 17 topics. There are 103 topics, each represented by a string. Their corpus frequencies span five orders of magnitude, from 5 occurrences for ‘GMIL’, to 381327 for ‘CCAT’:

trans-unit.source: A comparison of maximum likelihood, shrinkage and sparse estimates of the covariance and precision matrix in the very small samples settings.

trans-unit.source: Ball tree and KD tree query time will become slower as \(k\) increases. This is due to two effects: first, a larger \(k\) leads to the necessity to search a larger portion of the parameter space. Second, using \(k > 1\) requires internal queueing of results as the tree is traversed.
trans-unit.target: 随着\（k \）的增加，球树和KD树的查询时间将变慢。这是由于两个影响：首先，较大的\（k \）导致必须搜索较大部分的参数空间。其次，使用\（k> 1 \）要求遍历树时对结果进行内部排队。

trans-unit.source: Ball tree and KD tree query times can be greatly influenced by data structure. In general, sparser data with a smaller intrinsic dimensionality leads to faster query times. Because the KD tree internal representation is aligned with the parameter axes, it will not generally show as much improvement as ball tree for arbitrarily structured data.
trans-unit.target: 球树和KD树的查询时间会受到数据结构的极大影响。通常，具有较小固有维数的稀疏数据将导致更快的查询时间。因为KD树的内部表示与参数轴对齐，所以对于任意结构化的数据，它通常不会显示出比球形树那么大的改进。

trans-unit.source: Ball tree query time grows as approximately \(O[D \log(N)]\)
trans-unit.target: 球树查询时间大约增长\（O [D \ log（N）] \）

trans-unit.source: Brute force query time grows as \(O[D N]\)
Brute force query time is largely unaffected by the value of \(k\)
trans-unit.target: 蛮力查询时间基本上不受\（k \）值的影响

trans-unit.source: Brute force query time is unchanged by data structure.
trans-unit.target: 蛮力查询时间不受数据结构的影响。

trans-unit.source: Independent row and column normalization, as in Spectral Co-Clustering. This method makes the rows sum to a constant and the columns sum to a different constant.
trans-unit.target: 独立的行和列归一化，如“光谱共聚”中所述。此方法使行总和为常数，而列总和为不同的常数。

trans-unit.source: KD tree query time changes with \(D\) in a way that is difficult to precisely characterise. For small \(D\) (less than 20 or so) the cost is approximately \(O[D\log(N)]\), and the KD tree query can be very efficient. For larger \(D\), the cost increases to nearly \(O[DN]\), and the overhead due to the tree structure can lead to queries which are slower than brute force.
trans-unit.target: KD树查询时间以\（D \）改变，难以精确表征。对于较小的\（D \）（小于20左右），成本大约为\（O [D \ log（N）] \），并且KD树查询可以非常有效。对于较大的\（D \），成本增加到接近\（O [DN] \），并且由于树结构而导致的开销可能导致查询的速度比蛮力慢。

trans-unit.source: cosine distance is interesting because it is invariant to global scalings of the signal.
trans-unit.target: 余弦距离很有趣，因为它对于信号的整体缩放不变。

trans-unit.source: l1 distance is often good for sparse features, or sparse noise: i.e. many of the features are zero, as in text mining using occurrences of rare words.
trans-unit.target: l1距离通常适用于稀疏特征或稀疏噪声：即，许多特征为零，例如在使用稀有单词出现的文本挖掘中。

Additional keywords are passed to the distance metric class.
trans-unit.target: 其他关键字将传递到距离度量标准类。

trans-unit.source: Agglomerative - bottom-up approaches: each observation starts in its own cluster, and clusters are iteratively merged in such a way to minimize a linkage criterion. This approach is particularly interesting when the clusters of interest are made of only a few observations. When the number of clusters is large, it is much more computationally efficient than k-means.
trans-unit.target: 凝聚 -自下而上的方法：每个观测开始在自己的集群和集群以这样的方式，以尽量减少一个迭代合并联动标准。当感兴趣的簇仅由几个观察组成时，这种方法特别有趣。当簇数很大时，它的计算效率比k均值高得多。

trans-unit.source: Algorithm description: The messages sent between points belong to one of two categories. The first is the responsibility \(r(i, k)\), which is the accumulated evidence that sample \(k\) should be the exemplar for sample \(i\). The second is the availability \(a(i, k)\) which is the accumulated evidence that sample \(i\) should choose sample \(k\) to be its exemplar, and considers the values for all other samples that \(k\) should be an exemplar. In this way, exemplars are chosen by samples if they are (1) similar enough to many samples and (2) chosen by many samples to be representative of themselves.
trans-unit.target: 算法描述：点之间发送的消息属于两类之一。第一个是责任\（r（i，k）\），它是样本\（k \）应该是样本\（i \）的典范的累积证据。第二个是可用性\（a（i，k）\），它是样本\（i \）应该选择样本\（k \）为其示例的累积证据，并考虑所有其他样本的值\ （k \）应该是一个示例。以这种方式，如果样本（1）与许多样本足够相似，并且（2）由许多样本选择以代表自己，则它们由样本选择。

trans-unit.source: An illustration of label-propagation:the structure of unlabeled observations is consistent with the class structure, and thus the class label can be propagated to the unlabeled observations of the training set.
trans-unit.target: 标签传播的说明：未标记观察值的结构与类结构一致，因此可以将类标签传播到训练集的未标记观察值。

trans-unit.source: Average linkage minimizes the average of the distances between all observations of pairs of clusters.
trans-unit.target: 平均链接使成对的群集对的所有观测值之间的平均距离最小化。

trans-unit.source: Average precision (AP) summarizes such a plot as the weighted mean of precisions achieved at each threshold, with the increase in recall from the previous threshold used as the weight:
trans-unit.target: 平均精度（AP）总结了这样一个图，即在每个阈值处获得的精度的加权平均值，而前一个阈值的召回率增加用作权重：

trans-unit.source: Avoiding data copy: For SVC, SVR, NuSVC and NuSVR, if the data passed to certain methods is not C-ordered contiguous, and double precision, it will be copied before calling the underlying C implementation. You can check whether a given numpy array is C-contiguous by inspecting its flags attribute.
trans-unit.target: 避免数据复制：对于 SVC ， SVR ， NuSVC 和 NuSVR ，如果传递给某些方法的数据不是C顺序的连续和双精度的，则将在调用基础C实现之前将其复制。您可以通过检查给定的numpy数组的 flags 属性来检查其是否为C连续的。

trans-unit.source: Bistochastization: repeated row and column normalization until convergence. This method makes both rows and columns sum to the same constant.
trans-unit.target: 双歧化：重复行和列归一化直到收敛。此方法使行和列的总和为相同的常数。

trans-unit.source: Bonus: How much can you trust the selection of alpha?
Bounded range [-1, 1]: negative values are bad (independent labelings), similar clusterings have a positive ARI, 1.0 is the perfect match score.
trans-unit.target: 有界范围[-1，1]：负值不好（独立标签），相似的聚类具有正ARI，1.0是完美匹配分数。

trans-unit.source: Bounded scores: 0.0 is as bad as it can be, 1.0 is a perfect score.
trans-unit.target: 有界分数：0.0是尽可能糟糕的，1.0是完美的分数。

trans-unit.source: Case when population covariance matrix is isotropic
trans-unit.target: 总体协方差矩阵是各向同性的情况

trans-unit.source: Connectivity constraints with single, average and complete linkage
trans-unit.target: 具有单一，平均和完整链接的连接限制

trans-unit.source: Decision Trees (DTs) are a non-parametric supervised learning method used for classification and regression. The goal is to create a model that predicts the value of a target variable by learning simple decision rules inferred from the data features.
trans-unit.target: 决策树（DT）是一种用于分类和回归的非参数监督学习方法。目标是创建一个模型，该模型通过学习从数据特征推断出的简单决策规则来预测目标变量的值。

trans-unit.source: Developer guide: See the Utilities for Developers page for further details.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员指南：有关更多详细信息，请参见“ 开发人员实用程序”页面。

trans-unit.source: Divisive - top-down approaches: all observations start in one cluster, which is iteratively split as one moves down the hierarchy. For estimating large numbers of clusters, this approach is both slow (due to all observations starting as one cluster, which it splits recursively) and statistically ill-posed.
trans-unit.target: 分裂 -自上而下的方法：所有观察都始于一个簇，当一个簇向下移动时，它将被迭代地拆分。为了估计大量的聚类，此方法既缓慢（由于所有观察都是从一个聚类开始，然后递归拆分），而且在统计上是不适定的。

trans-unit.source: Estimated parameters: When data is fitted with an estimator, parameters are estimated from the data at hand. All the estimated parameters are attributes of the estimator object ending by an underscore:
trans-unit.target: 估计参数：当数据装有估计器时，参数是根据手头数据估计的。所有估计的参数都是估计对象的属性，其下划线结尾：

trans-unit.source: Estimator parameters: All the parameters of an estimator can be set when it is instantiated or by modifying the corresponding attribute:
trans-unit.target: 估计器参数：可以在实例化估计器或通过修改相应属性来设置估计器的所有参数：

trans-unit.source: Estimator score method: Estimators have a score method providing a default evaluation criterion for the problem they are designed to solve. This is not discussed on this page, but in each estimator’s documentation.
trans-unit.target: 估计器评分方法：估计器具有一种 score 方法，可为设计要解决的问题提供默认的评估标准。本页中没有讨论此问题，但是每个估算器的文档中都对此进行了讨论。

trans-unit.source: Examples:Bagging methods, Forests of randomized trees, …
trans-unit.target: 例如：套袋方法，随机树木森林 …

trans-unit.source: Feature binarization is the process of thresholding numerical features to get boolean values. This can be useful for downstream probabilistic estimators that make assumption that the input data is distributed according to a multi-variate Bernoulli distribution. For instance, this is the case for the sklearn.neural_network.BernoulliRBM.
trans-unit.target: 特征二值化是对数字特征进行阈值化以获得布尔值的过程。这对于下游概率估计器很有用，这些估计器假设输入数据是根据多元伯努利分布进行分布的。例如， sklearn.neural_network.BernoulliRBM 就是这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Fitting a time-series model, imposing that any active feature be active at all times.
trans-unit.target: 拟合时间序列模型，强加所有活动功能始终处于活动状态。

trans-unit.source: Fitting data: the main API implemented by scikit-learn is that of the estimator. An estimator is any object that learns from data; it may be a classification, regression or clustering algorithm or a transformer that extracts/filters useful features from raw data.
trans-unit.target: 拟合数据：scikit-learn实现的主要API是 estimator 的 API 。估计器是从数据中学习的任何对象。它可以是分类，回归或聚类算法，也可以是从原始数据中提取/过滤有用特征的转换器。

trans-unit.source: For each exercise, the skeleton file provides all the necessary import statements, boilerplate code to load the data and sample code to evaluate the predictive accuracy of the model.
trans-unit.target: 对于每次练习，骨骼文件都会提供所有必要的导入语句，用于加载数据的样板代码以及用于评估模型的预测准确性的示例代码。

trans-unit.source: Fraction of outliers versus amplitude of error
trans-unit.target: 离群值的分数与误差幅度的关系

trans-unit.source: Gaussian Processes (GP) are a generic supervised learning method designed to solve regression and probabilistic classification problems.
trans-unit.target: 高斯过程（GP）是一种通用的监督学习方法，旨在解决回归和概率分类问题。

trans-unit.source: Graph Laplacian Construction. unnormalized Graph Laplacian is constructed as \(L = D - A\) for and normalized one as \(L = D^{-\frac{1}{2}} (D - A) D^{-\frac{1}{2}}\).
trans-unit.target: 图拉普拉斯构造。未规范化的图拉普拉斯算子的构造形式为\（L = D-A \），而标准化的形式为\（L = D ^ {-\ frac {1} {2}}（D-A）D ^ {-\ frac {1 } {2}} \）。

trans-unit.source: Hint: You can use the decision_function method on a grid to get intuitions.
trans-unit.target: 提示：您可以在网格上使用 decision_function 方法来获取直觉。

trans-unit.source: If query_id is set to True, this will return instead [X1, y1, q1,

Kernel cache size: For SVC, SVR, NuSVC and NuSVR, the size of the kernel cache has a strong impact on run times for larger problems. If you have enough RAM available, it is recommended to set cache_size to a higher value than the default of 200(MB), such as 500(MB) or 1000(MB).
trans-unit.target: 内核缓存大小：对于 SVC ， SVR ， NuSVC 和 NuSVR ，内核缓存的大小对较大问题的运行时间有很大影响。如果有足够的可用RAM，建议将 cache_size 设置为比默认值200（MB）高的值，例如500（MB）或1000（MB）。

trans-unit.source: Log normalization: the log of the data matrix is computed: \(L = \log A\). Then the column mean \(\overline{L_{i \cdot}}\), row mean \(\overline{L_{\cdot j}}\), and overall mean \(\overline{L_{\cdot \cdot}}\) of \(L\) are computed. The final matrix is computed according to the formula

trans-unit.source: Maximum or complete linkage minimizes the maximum distance between observations of pairs of clusters.
trans-unit.target: 最大或完全链接使成对的群集之间的最大距离最小化。

trans-unit.source: Metric functions: The metrics module implements functions assessing prediction error for specific purposes. These metrics are detailed in sections on Classification metrics, Multilabel ranking metrics, Regression metrics and Clustering metrics.
trans-unit.target: 度量标准功能： metrics 模块实现了针对特定目的评估预测误差的功能。这些度量在“ 分类”度量，“ 多标签排名”度量，“ 回归”度量和“ 聚类”度量的各节中详细介绍。

trans-unit.source: Metrics intended for integer-valued vector spaces: Though intended for integer-valued vectors, these are also valid metrics in the case of real-valued vectors.
trans-unit.target: 适用于整数值向量空间的度量标准：尽管适用于整数值向量，但对于实值向量来说，它们也是有效的度量标准。
用于实值向量空间的度量标准：

trans-unit.source: Metrics intended for two-dimensional vector spaces: Note that the haversine distance metric requires data in the form of [latitude, longitude] and both inputs and outputs are in units of radians.
trans-unit.target: 适用于二维向量空间的度量标准：请注意，hasrsine距离度量标准需要[纬度，经度]形式的数据，并且输入和输出均以弧度为单位。

trans-unit.source: Multi-layer Perceptron (MLP) is a supervised learning algorithm that learns a function \(f(\cdot): R^m \rightarrow R^o\) by training on a dataset, where \(m\) is the number of dimensions for input and \(o\) is the number of dimensions for output. Given a set of features \(X = {x_1, x_2, ..., x_m}\) and a target \(y\), it can learn a non-linear function approximator for either classification or regression. It is different from logistic regression, in that between the input and the output layer, there can be one or more non-linear layers, called hidden layers. Figure 1 shows a one hidden layer MLP with scalar output.
trans-unit.target: 多层感知器（MLP）是一种监督式学习算法，通过在数据集上进行训练来学习函数\（f（\ cdot）：R ^ m \ rightarrow R ^ o \），其中\（m \）是输入的维数，\（o \）是输出的维数。给定一组特征\（X = {x_1，x_2，...，x_m} \）和一个目标\（y \），它可以学习用于分类或回归的非线性函数逼近器。它与逻辑回归的不同之处在于，在输入层和输出层之间，可以存在一个或多个非线性层，称为隐藏层。图1显示了一个具有标量输出的隐藏层MLP。

trans-unit.source: Multiclass classification means a classification task with more than two classes; e.g., classify a set of images of fruits which may be oranges, apples, or pears. Multiclass classification makes the assumption that each sample is assigned to one and only one label: a fruit can be either an apple or a pear but not both at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 多类别分类是指具有两个以上类别的分类任务；例如，对一组水果图像进行分类，这些图像可以是橙子，苹果或梨。多类分类的假设是，每个样本都分配给一个标签，并且只能分配一个标签：水果可以是苹果或梨，但不能同时是两者。

trans-unit.source: Multilabel classification assigns to each sample a set of target labels. This can be thought as predicting properties of a data-point that are not mutually exclusive, such as topics that are relevant for a document. A text might be about any of religion, politics, finance or education at the same time or none of these.
trans-unit.target: 多标签分类为每个样本分配了一组目标标签。可以将其视为预测不互斥的数据点属性，例如与文档相关的主题。文字可能同时涉及宗教，政治，金融或教育中的任何一个，或者都不涉及任何一个。

trans-unit.source: Multioutput regression assigns each sample a set of target values. This can be thought of as predicting several properties for each data-point, such as wind direction and magnitude at a certain location.
trans-unit.target: 多输出回归为每个样本分配一组目标值。可以将其视为预测每个数据点的多个属性，例如某个位置的风向和大小。

trans-unit.source: Multioutput-multiclass classification and multi-task classification means that a single estimator has to handle several joint classification tasks. This is both a generalization of the multi-label classification task, which only considers binary classification, as well as a generalization of the multi-class classification task. The output format is a 2d numpy array or sparse matrix.
trans-unit.target: 多输出多类分类和多任务分类意味着单个估计器必须处理多个联合分类任务。这既是对仅考虑二进制分类的多标签分类任务的概括，也是对多类分类任务的概括。输出格式为2d numpy数组或稀疏矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Nearest Neighbors Search. Same as standard LLE
Nearest Neighbors Search. See discussion under Isomap above.
trans-unit.target: 最近邻居搜索。请参阅上方Isomap下的讨论。

trans-unit.source: Nearest neighbor search. Isomap uses sklearn.neighbors.BallTree for efficient neighbor search. The cost is approximately \(O[D \log(k) N \log(N)]\), for \(k\) nearest neighbors of \(N\) points in \(D\) dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 最近邻居搜索。Isomap使用 sklearn.neighbors.BallTree 进行有效的邻居搜索。对于\（D \）维中\（N \）个点的\（k \）最近邻居，成本大约为\（O [D \ log（k）N \ log（N）] \）。

trans-unit.source: No assumption is made on the cluster structure: can be used to compare clustering algorithms such as k-means which assumes isotropic blob shapes with results of spectral clustering algorithms which can find cluster with “folded” shapes.
trans-unit.target: 无需对群集结构进行任何假设：可用于比较采用均质斑点形状的k-means等群集算法与可以发现“折叠”形状群集的光谱群集算法的结果。

trans-unit.source: Normalization is the process of scaling individual samples to have unit norm. This process can be useful if you plan to use a quadratic form such as the dot-product or any other kernel to quantify the similarity of any pair of samples.
trans-unit.target: 归一化是将单个样本缩放为具有单位范数的过程。如果您打算使用点积或任何其他核的二次形式来量化任何一对样本的相似性，则此过程将非常有用。
具有局部异常因素的新颖性检测
具有局部异常因素的新颖性检测`

trans-unit.source: Partial Eigenvalue Decomposition. Eigenvalue decomposition is done on graph Laplacian
trans-unit.target: 部分特征值分解。特征值分解在图拉普拉斯算子上完成

trans-unit.source: Partial Eigenvalue Decomposition. Same as standard LLE
trans-unit.target: 部分特征值分解。与标准LLE相同

trans-unit.source: Partial Eigenvalue Decomposition. See discussion under Isomap above.
trans-unit.target: 部分特征值分解。请参阅上方Isomap下的讨论。

trans-unit.source: Partial eigenvalue decomposition. The embedding is encoded in the eigenvectors corresponding to the \(d\) largest eigenvalues of the \(N \times N\) isomap kernel. For a dense solver, the cost is approximately \(O[d N^2]\). This cost can often be improved using the ARPACK solver. The eigensolver can be specified by the user with the path_method keyword of Isomap. If unspecified, the code attempts to choose the best algorithm for the input data.
trans-unit.target: 部分特征值分解。嵌入在对应于\（N \ times N \）isomap内核的\（d \）最大特征值的特征向量中进行编码。对于密集解算器，成本约为\（O [d N ^ 2] \）。通常可以使用 ARPACK 求解器来降低成本。用户可以使用 Isomap 的 path_method 关键字指定eigensolver。如果未指定，则代码将尝试为输入数据选择最佳算法。

trans-unit.source: Random (uniform) label assignments have a AMI score close to 0.0 for any value of n_clusters and n_samples (which is not the case for raw Mutual Information or the V-measure for instance).
trans-unit.target: 对于 n_clusters 和 n_samples 的任何值，随机（统一）标签分配的AMI得分都接近0.0（例如，原始互信息或V度量不是这种情况）。

trans-unit.source: Random (uniform) label assignments have a ARI score close to 0.0 for any value of n_clusters and n_samples (which is not the case for raw Rand index or the V-measure for instance).
trans-unit.target: 对于任何 n_clusters 和 n_samples 值，随机（统一）标签分配的ARI得分都接近0.0（例如，原始Rand索引或V-measure情况并非如此）。

trans-unit.source: Random (uniform) label assignments have a FMI score close to 0.0 for any value of n_clusters and n_samples (which is not the case for raw Mutual Information or the V-measure for instance).
trans-unit.target: 对于 n_clusters 和 n_samples 的任何值，随机（统一）标签分配的FMI得分都接近0.0（例如，原始互信息或V度量不是这种情况）。

trans-unit.source: Randomness of the underlying implementations: The underlying implementations of SVC and NuSVC use a random number generator only to shuffle the data for probability estimation (when probability is set to True). This randomness can be controlled with the random_state parameter. If probability is set to False these estimators are not random and random_state has no effect on the results. The underlying OneClassSVM implementation is similar to the ones of SVC and NuSVC. As no probability estimation is provided for OneClassSVM, it is not random.
trans-unit.target: 基础实现的随机性： SVC 和 NuSVC 的基础实现仅使用随机数生成器来随机整理数据以进行概率估计（当 probability 设置为 True 时）。可以使用 random_state 参数控制此随机性。如果将 probability 设置为 False ,则这些估计量不是随机的， random_state 对结果没有影响。底层的 OneClassSVM 实现类似于 SVC 和 NuSVC 的实现。由于没有为 OneClassSVM 提供概率估计，它不是随机的。

trans-unit.source: Reference Richard G. Baraniuk “Compressive Sensing”, IEEE Signal Processing Magazine [120] July 2007 http://users.isr.ist.utl.pt/~aguiar/CS_notes.pdf
trans-unit.target: 参考 Richard G. Baraniuk“压缩感测”，IEEE信号处理杂志[120] 2007年7月http://users.isr.ist.utl.pt/~aguiar/CS_notes.pdf
